spec.description: A simple dashboard to monitor k8s cronjobs

targets.expr: sum(kube_cronjob_info{namespace="$namespace"})
sum(kube_cronjob_spec_suspend{namespace="$namespace"})
sum(kube_cronjob_status_active{namespace="$namespace"})
sum(kube_job_failed{namespace="$namespace"})
count(kube_job_status_succeeded{namespace="$namespace"}==1)
count(kube_job_failed{namespace="$namespace"}==1)
count(kube_job_status_succeeded{namespace="$namespace"}==1)

min (
  (kube_job_status_completion_time{namespace="$namespace"}
  - on (job_name)
    kube_job_created{namespace="$namespace"})
  * on (job_name)
    group_left(owner_name)
      (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name=~"$cronjob"}))
)

sum by (owner_name)
(
  kube_job_status_active{namespace="$namespace"} * on (job_name)

  group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name=~"$cronjob"}))
  
)
topk(1,(kube_cronjob_info{namespace="$namespace",cronjob="$cronjob"}))

sum by (owner_name)
(
  kube_job_status_active{namespace="$namespace"} * on (job_name)

  group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name="$cronjob"}))
  
)

count by (owner_name)
(
  kube_job_complete{namespace="$namespace", condition="true"} + on (job_name)

  group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name="$cronjob"}))
  
)

count by (owner_name)
(
  kube_job_failed{namespace="$namespace", condition="true"} + on (job_name)

  group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name="$cronjob"}))
  
)

avg(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on (pod) group_left(created_by_name)
  kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"}
    * on (created_by_name) group_left(owner_name)
    label_replace(kube_job_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_name="$cronjob"}, "created_by_name", "$1", "job_name", "(.*)")) by (container)
(kube_cronjob_next_schedule_time{namespace="$namespace",cronjob="$cronjob"}*1000)

sum 
(
  kube_job_failed{namespace="$namespace"} * on (job_name)

  group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name="$cronjob"}))
  
)

min (
  (kube_job_status_completion_time{namespace="$namespace"}
  - on (job_name)
    kube_job_created{namespace="$namespace"})
  * on (job_name)
    group_left(owner_name)
      (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name="$cronjob"}))
)
kube_cronjob_status_last_schedule_time{namespace="$namespace",cronjob="$cronjob"}*1000

sum
(
  kube_job_complete{namespace="$namespace"} * on (job_name)

  group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner{owner_name="$cronjob"}))
  
)

(sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu", cluster="$cluster"}) by (pod)
  * on (pod) group_left(created_by_name)
  kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
    * on (created_by_name) group_left(owner_name)
    label_replace(kube_job_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_name="$cronjob"}, "created_by_name", "$1", "job_name", "(.*)")

(sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu", cluster="$cluster"}) by (pod)
  * on (pod) group_left(created_by_name)
  kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
    * on (created_by_name) group_left(owner_name)
    label_replace(kube_job_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_name="$cronjob"}, "created_by_name", "$1", "job_name", "(.*)")

panels.title: CPU Usage / Requests & Limits by pod

targets.expr:
(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", cluster="$cluster"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory", cluster="$cluster"}) by (pod) 
  * on (pod) group_left(created_by_name)
  kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
    * on (created_by_name) group_left(owner_name)
    label_replace(kube_job_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_name="$cronjob"}, "created_by_name", "$1", "job_name", "(.*)")

(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", cluster="$cluster"}) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory", cluster="$cluster"}) by (container)
  * on (pod) group_left(created_by_name)
  kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
    * on (created_by_name) group_left(owner_name)
    label_replace(kube_job_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_name="$cronjob"}, "created_by_name", "$1", "job_name", "(.*)")

panels.title: Memory Usage / Requests & Limits by pod

targets.expr:
(sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)
  * on (pod) group_left(created_by_name)
  kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
    * on (created_by_name) group_left(owner_name)
    label_replace(kube_job_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_name="$cronjob"}, "created_by_name", "$1", "job_name", "(.*)")

(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}) by (pod)
  * on (pod) group_left(created_by_name)
  kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
    * on (created_by_name) group_left(owner_name)
    # add label 'created_by_name' to join on kube_pod_info
    label_replace(kube_job_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_name="$cronjob"}, "created_by_name", "$1", "job_name", "(.*)")

spec.title: Kubernetes / Compute Resources / Cronjobs
